entry.tran: 间接提到的；暗指的；影射的；含典故的
entry.def: Allusive speech, writing, or art is full of indirect references to people or things.

example.ex: His new play, Arcadia, is as intricate, elaborate and allusive as anything he has yet written.
example.tran: 他的新剧《阿卡迪亚》和他写过的任何作品一样，错综复杂、构思精巧并且富含典故。
